title: Add Command
objective: Learn how to define commands using Electronic Data Sheets, how to define a command handler function, and register it with the command dispatcher.

exercise.instructions:
Locate the 'DataTypeSet: Command Payloads' comment block.
Create a new 'ContainerDataType':
  Named 'SetParam_Payload'
  EntryList entry named 'Param' with type 'BASE_TYPES/uint16'

Note BASE_TYPES is defined in cfe/modules/core_api/eds/base_types.xml

Locate the 'DataTypeSet: Command Packets' comment block.
Create a new 'ContainerDataType':
  Named 'SetParam'
  FunctionCode value of '${APP_C_FW/APP_BASE_CC} + 0'
  EntryList entry named 'Payload' with type 'SetParam_Payload'

Locate the Event Message Id (EID) definitions. At the end of the list add:
  #define @TEMPLATE@_SET_PARAM_EID   (@TEMPLATE@_BASE_EID + 4)

After the @TEMPLATE@_ResetAppCmd() function add
  The @TEMPLATE@_SetParamCmd() implementation from the lesson file.
